original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.PostTypeId=1 AND p.Score<=192 AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND p.ViewCount<=2772 AND p.AnswerCount<=5 AND u.DownVotes>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 AND posts.Score <= 192 AND (CAST(posts.ViewCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.ViewCount AS INTEGER) <= 2772) AND posts.AnswerCount <= 5
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2E4.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E6E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E4E6.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E6E3E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4E6E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2E4E6E3.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E6E3E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E4E6E3E5 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E4E6E3E5.Id)
